definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: Precise design of complete machine, compact conformation, handiness and simplicity.
sentences.chinese: 整機設計精緻，結構緊湊，操作方便簡潔。

sentences.english: Golden, with a very fine cordon of bubbles.
sentences.chinese: 金黃色的酒液，還有精緻的小氣泡。

sentences.english: He buys fine pottery for his wife and takes long walks with her on Sunday afternoons.
sentences.chinese: 他給老婆買精緻的瓷器，星期天下午帶她散很長的步。

sentences.english: The best way to wear animal print is to keep it subtle and simple.
sentences.chinese: 最好的穿着豹紋的方法是讓它看起來精緻而簡潔。
極其精緻的女士貼身襯衫。

sentences.english: Delicate smoked salmon provides a heart-healthy element to your table.
sentences.chinese: 精緻的薰三文魚爲您的餐桌增加有益心臟健康的元素。

sentences.english: With kettle body, portable and novelty, fashionable and elegant.
sentences.chinese: 優美流線型壺體，小巧玲瓏，時尚大方，精緻典雅。

sentences.english: The furniture and decorations were sparse and dainty.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，屋中的傢俱裝飾卻是少而精緻。

sentences.english: The elaborate design of grave goods, such as this wine container, signaled status.
sentences.chinese: 像這個酒器之類的設計精緻的隨葬品是地位的象徵。

sentences.english: The double-decked western - style design, the fine decoration, in the room has the independence the sauna room…
sentences.chinese: 雙層歐式設計，精緻的裝修，房間內有獨立的桑拿室。

sentences.english: Cancels the cloud to wear and so on some fine jade is leader's accessories.
sentences.chinese: 勾雲佩等一些精緻的玉件是首領的飾品。

sentences.english: That is when we like to buy rare and exquisite products.
sentences.chinese: 那就是我們喜歡去買的那些稀有和精緻的商品。

sentences.english: Dazzle her with these one of a kind sapphire and diamond earrings.
sentences.chinese: 這款精緻炫目的藍寶石鑽石耳環一定令她驚喜不已。

sentences.english: Design new products, refined decoration, delicate porcelain, jade white.
sentences.chinese: 產品造型新穎，裝飾精緻，瓷質細膩。

sentences.english: But the mechanism of alcohol-induced breast cancer are poorly understood.
sentences.chinese: 但是酒精緻乳腺癌的機理尚不清楚。

sentences.english: All the elegance, all the refinement of high society was gathered there.
sentences.chinese: 上流社會的所有高雅和精緻都被集中在那兒。
